/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/c++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX14.0.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=13.5 -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/useHello.dir/useHello.cpp.o -o useHello  -Wl,-rpath,/Users/kai/code/slam/ch2/build libhello_shared.dylib
